document.docAuthor: Jürgen C. Otto & David E. Hill
document.masterDocTitle: Seven new peacock spiders from Western Australia and South Australia (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini: Maratus)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Seven new peacock spiders from Western Australia and South Australia (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini: Maratus)

heading.emphasis:
AppendIx 1 : Reference lIst of descrIbed
Maratus
specIes

paragraph.emphasis:
The interim placement group at the end of this list contains a number of species that have not been recently collected, or that are known only from a few female specimens. Their interim placement in
Maratus
is the result of the synonymy of the genus to which they had been assigned,
Lycidas Karsch 1878
, with
Maratus (Otto & Hill 2012 c)
. Based on our examination of the female type for M. kochi (Żabka 1987 ) we think that this should be a
Maratus
, but further study of this species is required.
